ios.subtitle: Fun game for girls and boys

editorialNotes.standard: This mesmerising word game takes a winning idea—gameplay that resembles lockpicking—and runs with it. Sliding columns of letters up and down to form words is brain-teasing fun, and moving those dials feels genuinely good in a way we didn’t expect. We’re enjoying all the puzzles, but the ones with crossword-style clues really show off the quirky humour we adored in Zach Gage’s earlier games (like Ridiculous Fishing and Really Bad Chess).

name: Hangman Words - 2 player games
artistName: Togother Many Information Technology Co, Ltd.

editorialNotes.standard: A funky ’70s aesthetic, wild cards that thwart easy wins – we’ve rarely seen a word game with so much style.
